name: Ramadhan Delight
description: 🔥 Ramadhan Delight at Yawara 🔥 Break your fast in style with the finest melt-in-your-mouth cuts, grilled to perfection. 🍽️✨ Elevate your Iftar experience with premium flavors and an unforgettable dining moment.

name: Iftar Omakase
description: ✨ Experience the elegance of Japanese Omakase dining this Ramadan with Yawara Home Service! ✨ Our master chefs bring fresh, premium ingredients to your table, crafting each dish with precision and passion. 🍣🔥 Enjoy a touch of Japanese sophistication blended with Indonesian Ramadan traditions, complete with complimentary tajil & traditional tea. 🌙🍵

name: Eid Mubarak!
description: Eid Mubarak! 🌙✨ May this special occasion bring you peace, joy, and cherished moments with your loved ones. In celebration of Eid, we will be closed on March 31 & April 1 and will reopen soon to welcome you back. Wishing you a beautiful holiday filled with warmth and happiness. 🍽️🤍

name: Happy Easter
description: Easter in Bloom: Savor the season with every bite. Here, tradition meets the vibrant freshness of spring, offering a culinary celebration where comforting flavors harmonize with nature's renewal. Enjoy dishes that embody the gentle rebirth of the season.
